name: get_1_obter_c_digo_do_chat_code_to_chat
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool compras_net_api.
Tool description: Compras Net Api
API description: This function retrieves the chat code by querying the "compras-net" API using the provided UASG code and process number.

co_uasg.description: Code of the UASG (Unified System of General Services Code) of the organization.

numprp.description: Number of the process to be consulted.
